com.ibm.disni.rdma

类 RdmaEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.disni.rdma.RdmaEndpoint
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DiSNIEndpoint
    直接已知子类:
    RdmaActiveEndpoint

    public class RdmaEndpoint
extends Object
implements DiSNIEndpoint
    This class represents an RDMA client endpoint. Conceptually, endpoints behave like sockets for control operations (e.g., connect(), disconnect()), but behave like RdmaCmId's once connected (offering postSend((), postRecv(), registerMemory()).

        public void connect(SocketAddress dst,
                    int timeout)
             throws Exception
        Connect this endpoint to a remote server endpoint.

        connect 在接口中 DiSNIEndpoint
        参数:
        uri - (rdma://host:port)
        抛出:
        Exception

        public void close()
           throws IOException,
                  InterruptedException
        Close this endpoint. This closes the connection and free's all the resources, e.g., queue pair.
        抛出:
        InterruptedException
        Exception - the exception
        IOException

      • registerMemory

        public SVCRegMr registerMemory(ByteBuffer buffer)
                        throws IOException
        Register memory on this endpoint.
        参数:
        buffer - the buffer to be registered. The buffer needs to represent off-heap memory.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute the memory registration.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure
        IOException

      • postRecv

        public SVCPostRecv postRecv(List<IbvRecvWR> recvList)
                     throws IOException
        Post a receive operation on this endpoint.
        参数:
        recvList - list of receive requests.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute the receive operations.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

      • postSend

        public SVCPostSend postSend(List<IbvSendWR> sendList)
                     throws IOException
        Post a send operation on this endpoint.
        参数:
        sendList - list of send requests.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute the send operations.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException

        public void deregisterMemory(IbvMr mr)
                      throws IOException
        Deregister memory.
        参数:
